about_the_game:
The feeling of being observed rises every day to the point where it is uncomfortable.
Why someone comments on everything I do and where is the end to all of that?
EdgeRunner, an exhilarating parkour action game with elements of exploration and a touch of horror. Get ready to embark on an unforgettable journey where every step brings you closer to unraveling the truth.


Remember! to always check DIR in any terminal you find

EdgeRunner it's a combination of arcade parkour game with elements of exploration and horror and many endings. The only question is there a true ending to a story?
Also with a pinch humor we can't forget about that.



Game will
  • React to each ending and a get altered a bit
  • Each ending unlock a trophy
  • Some trophies unlock special abilities or another endings
  • Multiple Endings: Discover unique outcomes and shape your own path. Complete all endings to uncover the full story!
  • Unlock secrets with hacking puzzles.

name: EdgeRunner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200/Intel Core i5-7400 @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050 ti / AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The feeling of being observed rises every day to the point where it is uncomfortable. Why someone comments on everything I do and where is the end to all of that? Carbon copy of the loop of events with many endings of the story that has no end.
